remarks: The constructed metric space is a metric space iff the provided distance function is a metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
setsms.x $e |- ( ph -> X = ( Base ` M ) ) $.
setsms.d $e |- ( ph -> D = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) ) $.
setsms.k $e |- ( ph -> K = ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) $.
setsms.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. V ) $.
setsxms $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. *MetSp <-> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) ) $.
